title: The Full Drum Machine Collection
description: Complete collection of vintage and modern drum machine samples. Includes 68+ drum machine variations with high-quality samples.

title: Amir.pr0d 3k Drum kit
description: High-fidelity 24-bit audio samples from the legendary Korg MX drum synthesizer. Perfect for professional production.

title: 4-In-The-Floor Percussion Combo
description: Specialized percussion samples perfect for electronic music production. Includes kicks, hi-hats, and unique percussion layers.

title: 68 Vintage Drum Machines
description: Curated collection of 68 vintage drum machines spanning from the 1970s to 1990s. Authentic analog sounds digitally captured.

title: AJK Percussion-Synth
description: Innovative percussion synthesizer samples blending traditional and electronic sounds. Great for experimental and modern production.

title: AJK Percusyn
description: Advanced percussion synthesis library with layered samples. Includes modulation options and extended sound design capabilities.

title: Extra Item Seven
description: Additional sample collection for extended drum machine library. Provides more variety for music production projects.
